## ‚ùå Remove These Files (Redundant/Consolidated)

- ~~DATABASE_SETUP_GUIDE.md~~ ‚Üí Merged into DATABASE_SETUP_COMPLETE.md

## üìù Cleanup Command

To remove redundant files:

```bash
rm DATABASE_SETUP_GUIDE.md
rm DATABASE_SETUP_SUMMARY.md
rm QUICK_SETUP.md
rm EXPO_GO_LIMITATIONS.md
rm DATABASE_GUIDE.md
rm HYBRID_ARCHITECTURE.md
rm HOW_TO_CHECK_LOCAL_DB.md
```
